Detailed Description

Represents custom-built API for embedding Python into the application.

See: https://docs.python.org/3.8/extending/embedding.html https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1056051/how-do-you-call-python-code-from-c-code https://pybind11.readthedocs.io/en/stable/advanced/pycpp/object.html#casting-back-and-forth

◆ namespaceName()

virtual const char* rev::PythonAPI::namespaceName ( ) const
inlinevirtual

The full namespace for this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its full namespace. The built in logging methods will use this value for the message category

Reimplemented from rev::Object.
